title: "MILLION DOLLAR QUARTET"
content:
I can't seem to find an \*exact\* match -- lots of close fonts, but nothing that matches everything, including primarily the "Q" and the "R". Little help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mdq-sample-font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115344/http:/typophile.com/files/mdq-sample-font.jpg) | 73.34 KB |
author: ursine1

comments.content: Note: I'm not looking for a distressed version, just the base font. This seems like it should be easy but I'm not finding a match.
hm. Balboa and Industrial Gothic have similar Q. 'bout all i can say for them tho.

Some I like for your sample: [Rama Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rama-gothic) (possibly the closest I have) and [Enge Holzschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115344/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/e/engeholz.htm), [Thunderhouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/thunderhouse)
